entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is VeloBot. How can I assist you today?
Finally! I've been on hold forever! I need to return something. It's the VeloBand Pulse.
Thank you for calling VeloFit. My name is Sarah. I understand you’d like to return a VeloBand Pulse. I apologize for the wait time. Can I get your order number, please?
Ugh, fine. It's #VF789234. And hurry up, I don't have all day!
Thank you. One moment while I pull up your order... Okay, I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse on [Date of purchase - 15 days prior to call date]. What's the reason for the return?
It's just not what I expected. The heart rate tracking is off and it's uncomfortable to wear. I want my money back.
I understand. Our return policy allows for returns up to 90 days from the date of purchase. So returning your VeloBand Pulse is within our standard return window.
90 days? Really? I thought I only had a week or something. I was about to give up. So, I can definitely return it?

Yes, absolutely. Since you are within that 90 days time frame, we can proceed. To initiate the return, I will email you a prepaid shipping label. Just pack the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process a full refund to your original payment method. It may take up to 10 days for the refund to reflect in your account.
Okay, that sounds great! Will I get a confirmation email with the label and instructions?

Yes, you will receive an email within the next few minutes with everything you need to complete the return. It will include the prepaid shipping label, detailed instructions on how to pack and ship the VeloBand Pulse, and a summary of our return policy. The refund process will commence once we receive the smart watch back.
Perfect! Thank you so much for your help. I was really worried I was stuck with it.
You're very welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again! You've been a great help.
You're very welcome! Have a great day with VeloFit!
